post.title: Malicious Cursor MCP Drains Crypto
post.excerpt: Looks like some user got a bad plugin and it read his env file and drained his wallet a few days later. Another case to be made to only develop on machines with no sensitive machine access. https://x.com/0xzak/status/1955265807807545763?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
